Posts.Content: Jun 14, 2010 09:28AM Katesson wrote: Hi I had a core biopsy last Thursday and 3 zaps with the stapler thing.  The proceedure itself wasn't too painful only felt needle once but the area itself is now very angry and feels inflammed and sore.  I have vertually no bruising (tiny area size of a penny).  I get my results on Wednesday but the waiting thing is FREAKING ME OUT and I cannot think about anything else. Best to everyone else who is waiting xxx
Posts.Title: Core Biopsy Pain Estepp suems
